caption.title: Inhibition of Cl - channels reduces CHIKV replication in invertebrate cells.
caption.p: C6/36 cells were infected with CHIKV (MOI 2) in the presence of the MNTD of NPPB and Ribavirin, respectively. A) The viral titer (n = 3) and B) CHIKV RNA copy number (n = 3) were determined at 24 hpi. Error bars represent standard deviation. One-way ANOVA was performed to compare samples to untreated cells. *** p≤0.001, **** p≤0.0001.
